question: When and where is HackBeanpot 2020?
answer: HackBeanpot 2020 is from February 7-9, 2020 at Catalant Technologies in the Seaport district of Boston.

question: How do I apply?
answer: Unfortunately, applications for our 2020 hackathon are closed. Sign up for our newsletter here to learn more about the event and stay tuned for 2021!

question: I don't have a lot of programming experience. Are hackathons for me?
answer: Yes! People of all experience levels attend HackBeanpot. If you get stuck, we have mentors to provide assistance. We care much more about fostering a fun learning environment than an environment that only attracts experienced hackers. Our blog advice for first-time hackathon attendees can be found here and here.

question: I am a student from ____. Is HackBeanpot open to students from my school?
answer: Yes! HackBeanpot is open to any student who is at least 16 years old. If you will be under 18 by February 7, 2020, please contact team@hackbeanpot.com to fill out extra paperwork beforehand.

question: Do you provide travel reimbursements?
answer: Unfortunately, we are not able to provide travel reimbursements.

question: Are there limits on team size?
answer: No limits! However, prizes are budgeted for teams of 5 and under so we recommend at most 5 members per team.

question: Should I bring my resume?
answer: There is no need! You can upload your resume when you apply and we'll pass it along to sponsoring companies.

question: Can I work on an old project?
answer: Working on an existing project is ok, but you won't be eligible for prizes.

question: Will food be provided?
answer: YES, meals and snacks will be provided throughout the entire weekend!

question: What should I bring?
answer: HackBeanpot is an overnight hackathon, so we recommend bringing a laptop, charger, phone, toothbrush, and anything else you'd normally bring to an overnight event. We also wrote a blog post about what to bring.

question: I have a dietary restriction. Will there be food for me?
answer: Yup! Just make a note about your dietary restriction on the application; we'll make sure you're covered.
